mapper.select: SELECT reservationIdx AS calculationIdx, reservePrice, discountPrice, payPrice, (CASE calculateStatus WHEN 0 THEN '정산 미완료' WHEN 1 THEN '정산 완료' WHEN 2 THEN '정산 등록' END) AS calculateStatus, createdAt, paymentTime FROM Reservations WHERE paymentTime >= #{startDay} AND paymentTime <= #{endDay} AND storeIdx = #{storeIdx};
